nodes.title: ObjectCursor performance and selection of indexed values
Add error handling for too many login attempts error 429
Add synchronized to save operation in PersistentStore
[TEST][DO NOT MERGE]- Add flag to activate account verification
Add check body for unverified accounts in 403 responses
Add account verification response handling during login
WIP: Add sync status listeners to bucket
Add heartbeat listener interface for detecting server communication status
When a merge fails, queue the object to be synced again
Add support for case-insensitive search for UTF strings.
Fixes requesting revisions when indexer was running
Check pending changes for sent change
Adds Support for Retrieving Object Revisions
Use Looper.getMainLooper() to ensure that the handler works properly.
Keep local data when connecting to buckets
Don't allow a blank cv to be stored in the db.
Fix concurrency exceptions when saving object
Also catch an NPE when rescheduling the timer.
Issue #159: Send final modifications before remove operation
Only notify OnDeleteListener for local deletes
Added INSERT as a new ChangeType value.
Synchronizing access to Syncable JSON values
Using ConnectivityManager to check for network before connecting
Close cursors after they're not needed any longer.
Changed AndroidAsync version to be a wildcard on version 1.x
Call websocket methods from main thread
If we weren't able to retrieve the object/ghost for a change, dequeue it
Reset IndexProcessor and count existing objects as indexed
Explicitly call onDisconnect after disconnecting the socket
Fix #128: Create Change diff against latest Ghost
Fix #116 duplicate object returned in DB Query
Use uploadArchives task to publish release artifact
Remove query and use insertWithOnConflict in GhostStore.saveGhost().
Fire a bucket listener message after the bucket resets.
Control the number of times a change can be retried.
Don't add where clause if subject is null.
Channel now using dedicated thread for change queue
added type parameter to returned Query object for builder methods
Three way merge redownloaded object with local modifications
